input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Show Chrome Accessories 21-334 Highway Round Rail Peg System

Item keywords:
Fits Universal 1-1/4 inch Highway Bars
Works with Show Chrome Accessories Highway Bars
Chrome Finished Round Rail Style Peg Design
Sold as a Pair
input_text.Response A:
Our state-of-the-art Canon BP-718 compatible battery is designed and manufactured under strict European ISO 9001 standards. It meets and exceeds high priced OEM products, allowing you to power your camera/camcorder with a superior-quality battery for a fraction of the price! This includes two Compatible Digital Batteries and one Leatherette Camera/Lens Accessories Pouch (15x24 cm). Protective Retail Packaging, with each product wrapped with an inner plastic bag and outer box packaging. 

Compatibilities: Camera models: LEGRIA HF M506, LEGRIA HF M52, LEGRIA HF M56, LEGRIA HF R306, LEGRIA HF R36, LEGRIA HF R37, LEGRIA HF R38, VIXIA HF M50, VIXIA HF M500, VIXIA HF M52, VIXIA HF R30, VIXIA HF R300, VIXIA HF R32, VIXIA HF R40, VIXIA HF R400, VIXIA HF R42. Battery models: BP-709, BP709, BP-727 BP727 are also compatible and may have different capacities that would impact the size of the battery.

18 Months Manufacturer Warranty, Engineered and Manufactured Under European Standard ISO 9001. Guaranteed Superior Quality Meets or Exceeds High Priced OEM Products.
1600 mAh, 3.7 Volts, CE Approved, ROHS Compliant.
input_text.Response B: The billet aluminum Highway Clamp with Rail Peg has a pivoting foot peg for folding the pegs out of the way when they are not in use. Fits Show Chrome Accessories Highway Bars, OEM and aftermarket 1-1/4 inch Highway Bars/Engine Guards.
